feed.title: MoJ Security Guidance
feed.subtitle: This site documents the Ministry of Justice (MoJ) security policies and guidance.

entry.title: Acceptable use policy
entry.content: Provide more detail on monitoring of systems and information, and to clarify the situation regarding Data Protection and the storage or processing of information outside the UK.

entry.title: System backup policy
entry.content: Corrected broken links within the content, also some structural changes for easier cross-referencing with related topics.

entry.title: CCTV Policy
entry.content: This policy details the purpose, usage, and management of the CCTV systems within the MoJ.

entry.title: Working securely with paper documents and files
entry.content: This guidance helps you understand the risks involved in working with, sharing, and moving paper documents both inside and outside the office.

entry.title: Email blocking
entry.content: The policy and processes for blocking emails, and deleting emails through administrative processes, across email services across the MoJ.

entry.title: Domain names
entry.content: An overview of domain name registration and monitoring principles and responsibilities within the MoJ.

entry.title: Logging retention
entry.content: Information about keeping logging information.

entry.title: National Security Vetting contacts
entry.content: Updates to the process and information for National Security Vetting contacts.

entry.title: Remote working
entry.content: Simplified the guidance regarding remote working.

entry.title: Email best practices
entry.content: Added guidance regarding attachments and the use of 'cc' and 'bcc' fields in emails.

entry.title: Security clearance appeals procedures
entry.content: Added guidance for appealing a security clearance decision.

entry.title: Azure subscription baselines
entry.content: Added guidance on baselines and templates for Azure subscriptions.

entry.title: IT Health Checks
entry.content: Added guidance on requesting and managing IT Health Checks.

entry.title: User clearance requirements
entry.content: Clarification to minimum user clearance requirements.

entry.title: Wifi policy
entry.content: Added policy information about wifi.

entry.title: Client certificates
entry.content: Added notes about obtaining client certificates.

entry.title: Connection to public wifi
entry.content: Clarification about connecting to public wifi spots, such as hotels or coffee shops, or home broadband. Also extra details for remote working securely.

entry.title: Personal device attachment
entry.content: Clarifying the connection of personal peripherals, and the charging of personal devices from USB ports.

entry.title: Government Security Standard 007 V2
entry.content: Updates following the release of V2 of the Gov007 security standard.

entry.title: National Security Vetting contacts.
entry.content: Information on the role and registration process.

entry.title: Extra guidance on remote working.
entry.content: Additional best practices for keeping safe and secure when working away from the office.

entry.title: Update to general apps guidance.
entry.content: Add Trello guidance, and clarification over Official and Official Sensitive material in apps.

entry.title: Add change log page.
entry.content: Created a change log page, and associated RSS and Atom feeds, to describe new or changed content.

entry.title: Provide offline version of Group Security content.
entry.content: Created PDF and eBook versions of the security policy and guidance subset for Group Security.

entry.title: Clarification for accessing MoJ IT systems overseas.
entry.content: Additional information describing the process.

entry.title: Data Movement Form updated.
entry.content: Data Movement Form updated.
